TopicTitle: When will Realism Overhaul for KSP version 1.0.x be released?

Articles.Content:
Hey,

I was searching for this all over the internet but I was not successful. Do they work on it, or 

did they stop supporting the mod. Furthermore as long as the mod is not updated CKAN will not 

let me install RO.

Leerkas
CKAN will still install RO for previous versions, it automatically checks compatability.

It's been a long, hard slog because so much changed, but we're making good progress. The dev version is playable--hop on our IRC channel if you need to be walked through how--and the release shouldn't be too much longer.

> 
> When will Realism Overhaul for KSP version 1.0.x be released?

When it's ready.
